Function Documentation

static gboolean control_client_socket ( GIOChannel *  channel) [static]
Parameters:
channelThe client GIOChannel
Returns:
TRUE to continue reading on the client socket, FALSE to stop any action on it.

Control the client socket :

  • Read command
  • Execute command's callback (see run_command).
  • Send result

Here is the call graph for this function:

) [static]
Parameters:
channelServer GIOChannel.
condUnused.
sA Socket object.
Returns:
TRUE to continue listening, FALSE otherwise.

Listening on the socket and accept incomming connection.
